titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Drew A Gregg, Jr. (6): Counts 1,22 of the Indictment - A total term of imprisonment of 60 months, this sentence consists of terms of 60 months as to each of Counts 1 and 22 for the Indictment; to be served concurrently (This sentence shall be served consecutively to the revocation sentence imposed in case number 2:13-CR-5005 in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Tennessee); a term of supervised release of 4 years, this term consists of 4 years as to Counts 1 on the Indictment and 3 years as to Count 22 of the Indictment; such terms to run concurrently. (This term shall run concurrently to the 4 year to 2:13-CR-5005 in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Tennessee.); a special assessment fee of $200.00. Signed by District Judge R Leon Jordan on 11/13/2014. [USPO notified for designation] (JDH)

extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to John A Ayers (1): Count 1 of the Indictment - A total term of imprisonment of 292 months (This sentence shall be served concurrently with any sentence that may be imposed in docket number 13CR11304 in the General Sessions Court of Claiborne County, Tennessee; and docket numbers @1058780 and @1058781 in the General Sessions Court of Knox County, Tennessee. This sentence shall be served consecutively to any sentence that may be imposed in docket number 13CR12138 in the General Sessions Court of Claiborne County, Tennessee; and docket number 2014CR1806 in the Criminal Court of Claiborne County, Tennessee.), a term of supervised release of 5 years, a special assessment fee of $100.00; All remaining counts as to this defendant in this case are dismissed on the motion of the United States. Signed by District Judge R Leon Jordan on 2/23/2015. [USPO notified for designation] (JDH)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ayers et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Victor M Lynn (3): Count 1 of the Indictment - A total term of imprisonment of 262 months, a term of supervised release of 10 years, a special assessment fee of $100.00; All remaining counts as to this defendant in this case are dismissed on the motion of the United States. Signed by District Judge R Leon Jordan on 4/2/2015. [USPO notified for designation] (JDH)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ayers et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Gary S. Valentine (2): Counts 1,20 of the Indictment - A total term of imprisonment of 262 months, this sentence consists of terms of 262 months as to Count 1 of the Indictment and 120 months as to Count 20 of the Indictment, such terms to be served concurrently; a term of supervised release of 5 years, this term consists of 5 years as to Count 1 of the Indictment and 3 years as to Count 20 of the Indictment, terms to be served concurrently; a special assessment of $200.00; The remaining count as to this defendant in this case is dismissed on the motion of the United States. Signed by District Judge R Leon Jordan on 4/29/2015. (JDH)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ayers et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER denying pro se 912 Motion to Reduce Sentence - USSC Amendment for Donna S Roberts. To the extent that the defendants motion requests the appointment of counsel, that request is denied as well because the defendant is plainly not entitled to relief under Amendment 782. Signed by District Judge R Leon Jordan on May 8, 2015. (JAN, )(CM dft)
